item.title: Using R to go camping
item.description: Note: The final Shiny app is available here, and the code is available on GitHub. This post dives into the details for those interested Background As a data analyst, I spend a lot of time on my computer at the office. Unfortunately, I don’t have the best view of the outside world from my cubicle. In fact, they have decided to put us analysts in the basement where we can’t even see the sun!

item.title: Hello, Friend
item.description: Lets build something together My name is Stuart. I solve problems using data. I currently work within the Business Intelligence division of a consumer packaged goods company, with previous experience as a portfolio analyst for a wealth management firm. This site is a collection of my thoughts, projects and interests. I’m fascinated by the open source community, and all that can be learned/built from it. I try to work with open source tools such as R as much as I can, and in the spirit of collaboration, share what I learn along the way.
